description: From 1964 to 1970, the British American Hotel was hereâ€”a hotel that many gay people would visit.In 2012, the first Rainbow Run started at Dieppe Park. In 2013, the Run for Rocky was founded by the Campana family, in memory of Rocky Campana. The Run/Walk went from Dieppe Gardens, and was in support of local student GSAs. It continued annually until 2017.
